# Class RemoteSTTComponent

Remote STT (Speech-to-Text) component for audio transcription services. This component provides access to external speech recognition services for converting audio input into text transcriptions.

#### Example


```
const sttComponent = new RemoteSTTComponent(&#123;  id: 'my-stt-component',  sttConfig: &#123;    provider: 'whisper',    modelName: 'whisper-1',    language: 'en'  &#125;&#125;);

```


##### Index

### Constructors

constructor

### Methods

toGraphConfigComponent

Creates a new RemoteSTTComponent instance.

#### Parameters

    * props: RemoteSTTComponentProps

Configuration for the remote STT component

#### Returns [RemoteSTTComponent]()

Overrides AbstractComponent.constructor




## Methods

### `Protected`toGraphConfigComponent

  * toGraphConfigComponent(): [Component](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Component)

Converts the remote STT component to a graph configuration component.

#### Returns [Component](/interfaces/graph_dsl_graph_config_schema.Component)

The configured remote STT component for graph execution

Overrides AbstractComponent.toGraphConfigComponent
